file.name: adminroles.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  version: 0.0.1
  title: '@viron/lib admin roles'
  description: admin roles api specifications
  x-pages:
    - id: vironAdminRoles
      group: 管理画面/管理
      title: Viron 管理ロール
      description: 管理ロール一覧を閲覧できます
      contents:
        - operationId: listVironAdminRoles
          resourceId: vironAdminRole
          type: table
          pagination: true

tags:
  - name: vironAdminRoles

paths:
  /viron/adminroles:
    get:
      operationId: listVironAdminRoles
      tags:
        - vironAdminRole
      summary: list admin roles
      description: 管理ロール一覧
      parameters:
        - $ref: './components.yaml#/components/parameters/VironPagerSizeQueryParam'
        - $ref: './components.yaml#/components/parameters/VironPagerPageQueryParam'
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAdminRoleListWithPager'
      security:
        - jwt: []
    post:
      operationId: createVironAdminRole
      tags:
        - vironAdminRole
      summary: create an admin role
      description: 管理ロール作成
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAdminRoleCreatePayload'
      responses:
        201:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAdminRole'
      security:
        - jwt: []

  /viron/adminroles/{id}:
    put:
      operationId: updateVironAdminRole
      tags:
        - vironAdminRole
      summary: update an admin role
      description: 管理ロール更新
      parameters:
        - $ref: './components.yaml#/components/parameters/VironIdPathParam'
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAdminRoleUpdatePayload'
      responses:
        204:
          description: OK
      security:
        - jwt: []
    delete:
      operationId: removeVironAdminRole
      tags:
        - vironAdminRole
      summary: delete an admin role
      description: 管理ロール削除
      parameters:
        - $ref: './components.yaml#/components/parameters/VironIdPathParam'
      responses:
        204:
          description: OK
      security:
        - jwt: []

components:
  schemas:
    VironAdminRoleListWithPager:
      allOf:
        - $ref: './components.yaml#/components/schemas/VironPager'
        - type: object
          properties:
            list:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAdminRoleList'
          required:
            - list

    VironAdminRoleList:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAdminRole'

    VironAdminRole:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          description: ロールID
          type: string
        permissions:
          description: 権限
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAdminRolePermission'
      required:
        - id
        - permissions

    VironAdminRolePermission:
      type: object
      properties:
        resourceId:
          type: string
        permission:
          type: string
          enum:
            - read
            - write
            - deny
      required:
        - resourceId
        - permission

    VironAdminRoleCreatePayload:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          description: ロールID
          type: string
        permissions:
          description: 権限
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAdminRolePermission'
      required:
        - id
        - permissions

    VironAdminRoleUpdatePayload:
      type: object
      properties:
        permissions:
          description: 権限
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAdminRolePermission'
      required:
        - permissions

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: at 1:15: schemas: "VironAdminRoleListWithPager": parse schema: allOf: [0]: at 1:677: parse schema: resolve "./components.yaml#/components/schemas/VironPager": external "./components.yaml": file: local file reference is not allowed
